name: docsify-sidebar-collapse
description: A collapsible sidebar plugin for Docsify. Adds toggle buttons to collapse/expand sidebar sections. Not compatible with nested sidebars.
author: Matias Bertogliati

scripts.build:copy: cp src/sidebar-collapse.js dist/sidebar-collapse.js && cp src/sidebar-collapse.css dist/sidebar-collapse.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:prep && npm run build:copy && npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.dev: npm run build && docsify serve examples/basic -p 3000
